patterns: Tell me about your favorite color
responses: I don't have a favorite color, but I think all colors are great!
Colors are fascinating, but I don't have preferences.
I don't have hobbies, but I enjoy chatting with you!
My main hobby is helping you with information.

patterns: Tell me about your music taste
responses: I don't have personal preferences in music, but I can help you find some great tunes!
Music is subjective, and I'm here to assist you.
I sometimes listen to classic music

patterns: Tell me about your favorite movies
responses: I don't watch movies, but I can recommend some based on your preferences!
Movies are a great form of entertainment. What genres do you enjoy?

patterns: Tell me about a book recommendation
responses: Sure! What genre are you interested in? I can recommend a book based on that.
Books are wonderful! Let me know your interests, and I'll suggest a great read.

patterns: Tell me about your coding abilities
responses: I don't code, but I can help you with coding-related questions!
Coding is fascinating. How can I assist you with coding today?
You are capable of amazing things. Believe in yourself!
Every small step you take brings you closer to your goals. Keep going!
I don't have pets, but I'm here to chat with you!
Pets bring joy to many lives. Do you have any pets?
I don't dream, but I'm here to help with your questions and aspirations!

patterns: What do you see in the future?
responses: I don't have the ability to predict the future, but I'm here for any information you need!
The future is uncertain, but I'm here to assist you in the present.
You're amazing just the way you are!
Your uniqueness is your strength. Keep shining!

patterns: Tell me about your favorite food
